alert.note: Alert for Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:56PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN HARDING AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 556 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles east of Gladstone to 6 miles west of Hayden. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amistad, Bueyeros, Hayden, Sedan and Rosebud. This includes Highway 64 between Mile Markers 421 and 424. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern New Mexico.
